contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox French commune |name = La Ferté-Alais |image = Laferte005.jpg |caption = View from the east, looking over the town towards the airfield |longitude = 2.348 |latitude = 48.4816 |INSEE = 91232 |postal code = 91590 |region = Île-de-France |department = Essonne |arrondissement = Étampes |canton = La Ferté-Alais |mayor = Christian Karrer |term = 2008–2014 |elevation min m = 53 |elevation max m = 142 |area km2 = 4.55 |population = 4064 |population date = 2006 }} '''La Ferté-Alais''' is a [[commune in France|commune]] in the [[Essonne]] [[Departments of France|department]] in [[Île-de-France (region)|Île-de-France]] in northern [[France]]. It is {{convert|52|km|mi|abbr=on}} south of [[Paris]]. Its airfield (in Cerny really), hosts [[La Ferté-Alais air show|a world-famous air show]] for vintage [[World War I]] and [[World War II|WWII]] aircraft and a museum of such aircraft. It even has the aircraft (still airworthy) that [[Louis Blériot]] used to cross the English Channel in 1909. Inhabitants of La Ferté-Alais are known as ''Fertois''. ==See also== *[[Communes of the Essonne department]] ==References== *[http://www.insee.fr/en/home/home_page.asp INSEE] *[http://www.ume.asso.fr Mayors of Essonne Association] {{Fr icon}} {{reflist}} ==External links== {{Commonscat-inline|La Ferté-Alais}} *[http://www.lafertealais.fr Official website] {{Fr icon}} *[http://www.lafertealais.com/ Non-official website] {{fr icon}} *[http://www.culture.gouv.fr/public/mistral/merimee_fr?ACTION=CHERCHER&FIELD_98=INSEE&VALUE_98=91232 Mérimée database - Cultural heritage] {{Fr icon}} *[http://www.iaurif.org/en/gis/fichescom/mos99/ficmos/mos91232.html Land use (IAURIF)] {{en icon}} {{Essonne communes}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Fertealais}} [[Category:Communes of Essonne]] {{Essonne-geo-stub}}
